text: N-Methylspiperone (NMSP) is a derivate of spiperone that is used to study the dopamine and serotonin neurotransmitter systems. Labeled with the radioisotope carbon-11, it can be used for positron emission tomography. == References == Category:Dopamine antagonists Category:Piperidines Category:Lactams Category:Fluoroarenes Category:Spiro compounds Category:Aromatic ketones
title: N-Methylspiperone
